Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near 71st/Paxton
ShortDescription: SB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Jeffery, 73rd, & Yates, due to street blockage near 71st/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Jeffery, 73rd, & Yates, due to street blockage near 71st/Paxton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Reroute near 43rd/Wabash
ShortDescription: 43 43rd buses temp. rerouted EB: 43rd, Wabash, 41st, Michigan, & 43rd; WB: 43rd, Indiana, 41st, Wabash, & 43rd, due to street blockage near 43rd/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 43rd/Wabash, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 43rd, Wabash, 41st, Michigan, & 43rd.

Westbound buses will operate via 43rd, Indiana, 41st, Wabash, & 43rd.

Allow extra travel time.
